title: ARAM crashes game
body:
When I play an ARAM game, the game will crash and make it so I am unable to move my mouse, input any key commands, and unable to change windows. I always hear the sound of a error window coming up, but cannot see it; shortly after my computer just completely freezes and I'm forced to restart it. Sometimes—but not always—the game will just black out for a bit and then return. This did not happen until these recent patches.

I'm using Windows 7 (64 bit), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, and 16 GB of ram. I can send recent R3d logs if necessary.

replies.body: Hmmmm it really sounds like your pc is having a hard time getting ARAM's to load correctly. It might be hitting a file it can't read correctly from it either being corrupted or outdated graphics drivers. Let's run a quick repair first, and afterward, run through the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover the rest of some basic issues.
i too can no longer play ARAMs due to similar crashes... :(
